meanings.definition: Not relating to numbers or numerical values.
meanings.sent1: The artist used a variety of nonnumericals colors in the painting.
meanings.sent2: She preferred to focus on nonnumericals aspects of the story rather than the statistics.
meanings.sent3: The nonnumericals decorations at the party added a whimsical touch.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas of nonnumericals thoughts, swirling and blending together.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a burst of nonnumericals beauty, with flowers of every shape and color.

meanings.definition: Things that are not numerical in nature.
meanings.sent1: The bookshop had a section dedicated to nonnumericals like poetry and fiction.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed collecting nonnumericals such as seashells and postcards.
meanings.sent3: The box of nonnumericals in the attic held memories of a bygone era.
